climbs.name: Bridge-It Bardot
climbs.fa: Charles Cole, Dave Evans, Tom Michael, 1986

content.description:
Bridge-It is a super fun adventure climb that is very accessible.  Good training for Firewater Chimney.

Chimney up the steep slot with bolt protection.  Make a difficult and committing exit move to much easier and relaxing climbing to the top.
content.protection: Four bolts and a light rack.  Multiple anchor possibilities and adventure descent.
content.location: From the main Wonderland Wash head to the left end of the  Duckwaddle west face and look for a dark chimney feature with obvious bolts capped by a buldge.

climbs.name: The Boob Tube
climbs.fa: Alan Bartlett and May Ann Kelly - October 1996

content.description:
Apply named route climbs the prominent chimney on the west face Middle Duckwaddle Dome.

Above the chimney continue on fun and easier face climbing above to a comfortable ledge.  Follow a super fun secure crack above to the summit.

A safe and fun adventure route.
content.protection: Standard rack with broad selection of cams and some cord/long slings for tying off blocks for anchors.
content.location: From the main Wonderland Wash locate the prominent lower angle chimney on the West Face of Middle Duckwaddle Dome.  Climb this.
